snippet: At least 60 people died and dozens were injured after torrential rains that began on Sunday and continued into Monday.
abstract: At least 60 people are killed and dozens injured in Burundi after heavy rains cause flooding and landslides.
lead_paragraph: At least 60 people died and dozens were injured after torrential rains that began on Sunday and continued into Monday.

headline.main: Flooding and Landslides in Burundi Kill Dozens
headline.print_headline: Burundi: Flooding and Landslides Leave Dozens Dead
